name: concurrency-friends
description: Go-style channels and some other concurrency tools.
author: Cinnamon <cinnamon_npm@fastmail.com>

scripts.depchart-basic: mkdir   -p depchart && depchart `find src | grep .ts` --exclude src/index.ts src/decl/typings.d.ts `find src | grep '/example/'` `find src | grep '/test/'` --rankdir LR -o depchart/depchart-basic --node_modules omit
scripts.depchart-all: mkdir     -p depchart && depchart `find src | grep .ts` --exclude src/index.ts src/decl/typings.d.ts                                                          --rankdir LR -o depchart/depchart-all     --node_modules omit
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
